text: 5|109|now thngai del a l laoh bramoul phtom  anakneasar teanglay  ruoch trong suor tha  tae puok anak trauv ban ke( mnoussa lok)chhlaeyotb ( champoh kar ampeavneav) yeang dauch me  d ch?  banda anakneasar ban chhlaey  tha  puok yeung minban doeng te .  pitabrakd nasa  trong temuoyokt  mha doeng nouv brakear athrkambang teanglay .
